roleset.name: convert to binary image
roleset.note: BINARIZATION-N, BINARIZE-V Added by Meredith, no VN or FN frames.

example.name: binarize-v
example.text: We binarize the categorical input so that they can be thought of as a vector from the Euclidean space.
example.arg: so that they can be thought of as a vector from the Euclidean space

example.name: binarization-n with Arg2
example.text: Such binarization into the two major surface classes.
example.arg: into the two major surface classes

example.name: binarization-n with Arg1
example.text: A multi-scale framework for adaptive binarization of degraded document images.
